<George Thorogood and the Destroyers
1:
--------------------
Text: George Thorogood and the Destroyers (album):  Consisting mostly of covers of blues hits, it included a medley of John Lee Hooker's "House Rent Boogie" and "One Bourbon, One Scotch, One Beer", the latter a song written by Rudy Toombs for Amos Milburn, and later covered by Hooker.

Triplets:<George Thorogood
One Bourbon, One Scotch, One Beer
